tool_description: API to generate avatars with various styles and customization options.
title: DiceBear Avatars API

api_list.name: get_avatar
api_list.description: Get an avatar based on the specified style and options.

required_parameters.name: style_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the avatar style.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format of the avatar (default: svg).

api_list.code:
import requests

base_url = 'https://api.dicebear.com/9.x/{style_name}/{format}'
params = {'seed': seed, 'hair': ','.join(hair) if hair else None, 'flip': str(flip).lower() if flip is not None else None}
response = requests.get(base_url, params=params)
print(response.content if 'image' in response.headers.get('content-type', '') else response.json())
api_list.body: Binary representation of the image (if successful) or JSON if there's an issue.
